alert.note: Alert for Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 1:53PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BEAUREGARD... WESTERN VERNON PARISHES IN WEST CENTRAL LOUISIANA AND NORTHEASTERN NEWTON COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CST... At 153 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stringtown, or 7 miles southeast of Burkeville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Leesville, Rosepine, Anacoco, Toledo Bend Dam, Fort Johnson, Burkeville, New Llano, Burr Ferry, Mayflower, Junction, Stringtown, Evans, and Pickering. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
